  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205371</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Art Goes Back to School: Young Audiences of Northern California</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kunst geht zurück zu Schule: Junge Publikum
von Nordkalifornien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'art va de nouveau à l'école : Jeunes 
assistances de la Californie nordique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A arte vai para trás educar: Audiências 
novas de Califórnia do norte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'arte va di nuovo alla scuola: Pubblici 
giovani della California del Nord</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η τέχνη επιστρέφει στο σχολείο: Νέα ακροατήρια 
βόρειας Καλιφόρνιας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El arte va de nuevo a escuela: Audiencias 
jóvenes de California norteña</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">For more than 40 years, Young Audiences of Northern California has been providing quality arts education programs to K-12 schools and communities - over 250,000 each year. This Educator Guide explores the history of arts education in California and the Bay Area and provides a wide array of local resources.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Für mehr als 40 Jahre hat junge Publikum von 
Nordkalifornien Qualitätskunst-Ausbildung Programme zu den Schulen 
K-12 und zu den Gemeinschaften - über 250.000 jedes Jahr zur 
Verfügung gestellt. Diese Erzieher-Anleitung erforscht die 
Geschichte der kunstausbildung in Kalifornien und im Bucht-Bereich und
stellt eine breite Reihe lokale Betriebsmittel zur Verfügung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pendant plus de 40 années, les jeunes assistances
de la Californie nordique avait fourni tous les ans des programmes 
d'éducation d'arts de qualité aux écoles K-12 et aux communautés -
plus de 250.000. Ce guide d'éducateur explore l'histoire de 
l'éducation d'arts en Californie et région de compartiment et 
fournit une grande sélection de ressources locales.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Por mais de 40 anos, as audiências novas de 
Califórnia do norte têm fornecido programas da instrução das artes
da qualidade às escolas K-12 e às comunidades - sobre 250.000 cada 
anos. Esta guia do educador explora o history da instrução das
artes em Califórnia e na área da baía e fornece uma disposição 
larga de recursos locais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per più di 40 anni, i pubblici giovani della 
California del Nord sta fornendo ogni anno i programmi di formazione 
di arti di qualità alle scuole K-12 ed alle Comunità - oltre 
250.000. Questa guida dell'educatore esplora la storia di 
formazione di arti nella California e nella zona della baia e fornisce
una grande selezione delle risorse locali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Για περισσότερο από 40 έτη, τα νέα ακροατήρια 
βόρειας Καλιφόρνιας έχουν παράσχει τα προγράμματα αγωγής 
ποιοτικών αισθητικών σε Κ- 12 σχολεία και κοινότητες - πάνω 
από 250.000 κάθε έτος. Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών 
ερευνά την ιστορία της αισθητικής αγωγής σε Καλιφόρνια και την 
περιοχή κόλπων και παρέχει μια ευρεία σειρά τοπικών στοιχείων 
συμπεριφοράς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Por más de 40 años, las audiencias jóvenes de 
California norteña han estado proporcionando a programas de la 
educación de los artes de la calidad a las escuelas K-12 y a las 
comunidades - sobre 250.000 cada años. Esta guía del educador 
explora la historia de la educación de los artes en California y el 
área de la bahía y proporciona a una amplia gama de recursos 
locales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
